<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Count number of 0&#39;s from the least significant bit to the most</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>(1) &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a37c1fdede126353d80c3753dfe06f3c7">llvm::bit&#95;width</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) - 1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns the smallest integral power of two no smaller than Value if Value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// nonzero.  Returns 1 otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Ex. bit&#95;ceil(5) == 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4cc11b26432f9343b3c532f06171ad04"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; &#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4cc11b26432f9343b3c532f06171ad04">bit&#95;ceil</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::is&#95;unsigned&#95;v&lt;T&gt;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Only unsigned integral types are allowed.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt; 2)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/populationcounter"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T, std::</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SizeOfT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/populationcounter">PopulationCounter</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/populationcounter/#a13def8e0baf1d3752ea98b8fe2033214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/populationcounter/#a13def8e0baf1d3752ea98b8fe2033214">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generic version, forward to 32 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(SizeOfT &lt;= 4, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not implemented!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;GNUC&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)&#95;&#95;builtin&#95;popcount(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t v = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    v = v - ((v &gt;&gt; 1) &amp; 0x55555555);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    v = (v &amp; 0x33333333) + ((v &gt;&gt; 2) &amp; 0x33333333);</span></CodeLine>
